name: The Harsh Life of a Crab
name_original: The Harsh Life of a Crab
description:
You go on vacation to have fun. Maybe you just want to swim and eat some snacks. You throw away the garbage. But have you ever thought about what some animals deal with? Here you go. You are a crab and people keep throwing garbage at you.

Made for Weekly Game Jam #162. Theme "Crab"
